pr_title: DHFPROD-5637: Adding entity def with namespace to reference project

timeline.bodyText: I think we can get rid of this file. hubDeployAsDeveloper will generate this via hubGeneratePii anyways.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: It either needs to be gitignored or added to version control. What I'll do is make one of the properties be PII, as we really ought to have one for testing anyway. I'll give pii-reader to one of the users too.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Just added "ssn" to Customer and made it PII. So now there's a path file and the roleset file.
replies.author: rjrudin

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5637: Adding entity def with namespace to reference project

This is to facilitate testing of XML entity instances with data in a namespace. 

Also added "status" data for Customer entities so that a facet on it can be tested. 

Also added "ssn" to Customer and made it PII so we can test that.

DHFPROD-5637: Adding entity def with namespace to reference project

This is to facilitate testing of XML entity instances with data in a namespace. 

Also added "status" data for Customer entities so that a facet on it can be tested. 

Also added "ssn" to Customer and made it PII so we can test that.
